EmailTemplate.description: Dunkin Pre-Install Checklist w PIC attachment
EmailTemplate.name: Dunkin Pre-Install Checklist
EmailTemplate.subject: Important ! Review Dunkin Install Pre-Requisites PC#
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Franchisee, As previously communicated, the PC listed below is now in NCR Deployment. You will move through a series of POS deployment steps towards your install and Go Live. This requires your immediate attention. Please confirm or return the outstanding items below. Please confirm your site(s) Planned Install and/or Opening (Go-Live) date from the list below:
Install dates cannot be 'requested' or 'scheduled' until all of the following items are Closed. ____________________________________________________________
____________________________________________________________ Thank you, NCR POS Dunkin Deployment Team ______________________________________ (866) 523-3665 Option 1: Install Scheduling ncrposdeployment.hsr@ncr.com
Option 2: Sales Assistance ncrposorders.hsr@ncr.com
